properties.name: _valueIsSet
properties.description: is true when the value is not undefined

properties.name: type
properties.description: the type of the native input

properties.name: default
properties.description: the default value of the input

properties.name: noAutoWidth
properties.description: if true, the length of the value is not used for computing the size-attribute

properties.name: autoResize
properties.description: if true, the length of the value is not used for computing the size-attribute

properties.name: _minWidthString
properties.description: string that is used to compute the minimal width of the input

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: if `true`, the input is not displayed

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: regular expression pattern of the input

methods.name: _attachDom
methods.description: attach dom with `delegatesFocus: true` so that the element is also focussed while its's children are too, and to autofocus to first tabable

methods.name: resize
methods.description: called automatically when static `_minWidthString` changes, but can called manually to resize the minwidth of the input, when the input is for example initially hidden
